text:
October 3, 1956
Mr* K* 8. Novik
Room 500, 300 W. 23rd Street
New York 11, New York
Dear Maury:
Tussdey evening—after dinner, looks good to m for a get-
together. Hope you can make it.
Herewith, with thanks, your clippings on Houston. He«ve
quoted briefly in the current Newsletter.
Incidentally, re paragraph one, we understand you to mean
you might be able to attend Convention a day or a day and
night. ^ Right? Tuesday night and all or part of Wednesday
would then be our (dchooley*s and ray) suggestion.
Sincerely,
HJS/fb
